item.title: US support 'crucial,' Zelenskyy says amid mineral deal negotiations
item.description: Ukraine is "preparing for negotiations" with the U.S. regarding security guarantees and "crucial" aid, President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said.

item.title: Foul play not suspected as actor Gene Hackman, wife and dog found dead, sheriff says
item.description: The couple was found during a welfare check after their neighbor called in concerned about their well-being.

item.title: Number of Americans filing for unemployment rises to 242,000, highest in 3 months
item.description: Applications for U.S. jobless benefits rose to a three-month high last week but remained within the same healthy range of the past three years

item.title: WATCH: Conan O’Brien rolls out the Oscars red carpet
item.description: The host of the 97th Academy Awards was eager to help roll out the iconic 900-foot-long carpet to kick off the final countdown to Sunday’s show.

item.title: DOGE says it's now saved $65B in federal funds, but that's still impossible to verify
item.description: DOGE has updated its website to say it's slashed $65 billion in federal funding -- but they only provide records for $9.6 billion in savings from cont...
